com.facebook.buck.rules

Class ConstructorArgMarshaller

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.facebook.buck.rules.ConstructorArgMarshaller

  • public class ConstructorArgMarshaller
extends Object
    Used to derive information from the constructor args returned by Description instances. There are two major uses this information is put to: populating the DTO object from the BuildRuleFactoryParams, which is populated by the functions added to Buck's core build file parsing script. The second function of this class is to generate those functions.
    See Also:
    ConstructorArg

    • Constructor Detail

      • ConstructorArgMarshaller

        public ConstructorArgMarshaller(Path pathFromProjectRootToBuildFile)
        Constructor. pathFromProjectRootToBuildFile is the path relative to the project root to the build file that has called the build rule's function in buck.py. This is used for resolving additional paths to ones relative to the project root, and to allow BuildTarget instances to be fully qualified.
        Parameters:
        pathFromProjectRootToBuildFile - The path from the root of the project to the directory of the build file that this function is being created from.

    • Method Detail

      • populate

        public void populate(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver,
            ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
            BuildRuleFactoryParams params,
            ConstructorArg dto)
              throws ConstructorArgMarshalException
        Use the information contained in the params to fill in the public fields and settable properties of dto. The following rules are used:
        • Boolean values are set to true or false.
        • BuildRules will be resovled.
        • BuildTargets are resolved and will be fully qualified.
        • Numeric values are handled as if being cast from Long.
        • SourcePath instances will be set to the appropriate implementation.
        • Path declarations will be set to be relative to the project root.
        • Strings will be set "as is".
        • Lists and Sets will be populated with the expected generic type, provided the wildcarding allows an upperbound to be determined to be one of the above.
        Any property that is marked as being an Optional field will be set to a default value if none is set. This is typically Optional.absent(), but in the case of collections is an empty collection.
        Parameters:
        ruleResolver - The resolver to use when looking up BuildRules.
        params - The parameters to be used to populate the dto instance.
        dto - The constructor dto to be populated.
        Throws:
        ConstructorArgMarshalException

      • populate

        public void populate(BuildRuleResolver ruleResolver,
            ProjectFilesystem filesystem,
            BuildRuleFactoryParams params,
            ConstructorArg dto,
            boolean onlyOptional)
              throws ConstructorArgMarshalException
        Throws:
